description.value:
Special: Flexible, Snare

Note: Without training, missing an attack causes user to hit themselves in random location. With +0 Weapon Skill Test, user latches to protruding object within 5 metres. Grapplewhip can then retract to pull object to person or vice versa.

system.notes: Without training, missing an attack causes user to hit themselves in random location. With +0 Weapon Skill Test, user latches to protruding object within 5 metres. Grapplewhip can then retract to pull object to person or vice versa.
